alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 6:38PM EST until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... N.E. Cape Fear near N.E. Cape Fear River Near Beulaville affecting Duplin County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...N.E. Cape Fear near N.E. Cape Fear River Near Beulaville. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM EST Wednesday was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued by Thursday morning at 1000 AM EST.
